trainings.title: Health & Safety, Security & Emergency Procedures
trainings.notes: Hotel-led in-person training (On-Job-Training, OJT) is permitted & completions must be tracked in the IHG University application.

trainings.notes: Hotel-led in-person training (On-Job-Training, OJT) is permitted & completions must be tracked in the IHG University application.

trainings.title: Welcome to IHG
trainings.notes: Self-paced Online Learning (1 Hour). Hotel-led in-person training (On-Job-Training, OJT) is permitted & completions must be tracked in the IHG University application.

trainings.title: Brand Service Training
trainings.notes: Franchised hotels complete the course: Kimpton Brand Orientation. IHG Company Managed hotels complete the course: New Hire Orientation - take the Leading Role, a Kimpton Cultural Cornerstone (NHO).
